title: Sentinel
description: When random people across the world abruptly vanish, Darien Aetherswift looks to a secretive Serran Academy for answers... and stumbles upon their ancient collection of supernatural powers.But the Academy is destroyed in a brutal raid, trapping Darien on the wrong side of a surreal war. As apocalyptic plagues twist reality, what becomes of truth... and who can be trusted?
author: Jamie Foley
